name: UISpringLoadedInteractionBehavior
desc: The interface for specifying the behavior of a spring-loaded interaction.

items.name: func shouldAllow(UISpringLoadedInteraction, with: UISpringLoadedInteractionContext) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that determines whether spring-loaded interaction should begin or should continue for the specified context.

items.name: func interactionDidFinish(UISpringLoadedInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the behavior object when the spring-loading interaction is finished, either because it was canceled or because spring loading was activated.
